The workshop will be held at the [Strand Campus](https://www.kcl.ac.uk/visit/strand-campus) of [King's College London](https://www.kcl.ac.uk/). Scientific sessions will be held in Room K2.40.

Accessibility -- K2.40, the River room (for refreshments) and toilet facilities have step-free access via a lift (to the 2nd floor). Once you enter the main reception, walk straight ahead towards the King's Building and lifts will be on your left-hand side.
